hero.title: Professional AI E-Commerce Product Images
hero.subtitle: Generate stunning product visuals in seconds. Studio Genesis, Aesthetic Mirror, Clothing Studio, and Image Retouching — all in one platform.

studioGenesis.name: Studio Genesis
studioGenesis.description: Transform plain product photos into professional e-commerce visuals with AI-generated scenes.

aestheticMirror.name: Aesthetic Mirror
aestheticMirror.description: Clone any visual style and apply it to your products for consistent brand identity.

clothingStudio.name: Clothing Studio
clothingStudio.description: Generate standard shots, 3D mannequin, and macro detail variants for fashion products.

refinementStudio.name: Refinement Studio
refinementStudio.description: Retouch and refine product images with AI-powered white background and enhancement.

genesis.title: Studio Genesis
genesis.description: One Shot, A Complete Visual Ecosystem. Architect your entire product gallery in seconds.
genesis.designBriefPlaceholder: Describe your product's USP and desired aesthetic
genesis.emptyState: Upload your product photo and fill the brief. Click 'Analyze & Blueprint' to start.
genesis.planPreviewDesc: Review the proposed scene logic and asset distribution.
genesis.designSpecsDesc: Universal visual standards for all images
genesis.imagePlanCount: {count} images total, click to edit title or description
genesis.allImagesFailed: All images failed to generate. Please check your settings and try again.

aestheticMirror.title: Style Replicate
aestheticMirror.description: Upload a reference image and product assets to replicate the visual style in one click.
aestheticMirror.referenceCardDesc: Upload a reference image with a clear visual style
aestheticMirror.firstImageHint: Only the first product image is used for generation in this version
aestheticMirror.promptDesc: Fill this optionally, or generate directly
aestheticMirror.promptPlaceholder: Example: Add a limited-offer sticker, with soft low-saturation lighting...
aestheticMirror.uploadReference: Drop image here or click to upload
aestheticMirror.batchSingleProductHint: Batch replicate supports exactly one product image.
aestheticMirror.noResultError: No output image returned. Please try again.

clothingStudio.title: Clothing Studio
clothingStudio.description: Generate three professional clothing variants from a single product image.

refinementStudio.title: Refinement Studio
refinementStudio.description: Upload product photos and refine them one by one with batch processing and failed-item retry.
refinementStudio.uploadDropLabel: Drag images here or click to upload
refinementStudio.uploadSupportHint: Supports JPG and PNG, up to 50 images
refinementStudio.uploadLimitHint: Supports JPG and PNG, up to 50 images
refinementStudio.uploadInvalidFormat: Only JPG and PNG are supported, and each image must be <= 10MB
refinementStudio.uploadLimitReached: You can upload up to 50 images
refinementStudio.requirementsSubtitle: Describe special requirements for image refinement (optional)
refinementStudio.requirementsExample: e.g. Remove background clutter, enhance product gloss, fix scratches, remove text in image, improve overall clarity...
refinementStudio.waiting: Upload product images and start refinement
refinementStudio.allFailed: All images failed. Please adjust settings and retry.

common.uploadLabel: Drop image here or click to upload
common.requirementsPlaceholder: Describe the scene, style, or background you want…
